data.text:
Michael Cotterell Geoffrey David Mordaunt-Smith1

M, #511891, b. 30 June 1927, d. 18 February 1992

Last Edited=31 Oct 2014

Consanguinity Index=0.0%

Michael Cotterell Geoffrey David Mordaunt-Smith was born on 30 June 1927.2 He was the son of Cotterell Boughton Mordaunt-Smith and Hon. Kathleen Marcia Browne.2 He married, firstly, Diana Katherine Potter, daughter of Joseph John Edward Potter, on 23 May 1959.2 He and Diana Katherine Potter were divorced in 1971.1 He married, secondly, Alexandra Sarah Cardew, daughter of Arthur Hugh Alexander Cardew, in 1972.1 He died on 18 February 1992 at age 64.1

He was educated at Lancing College, Lancing, Sussex, England.1 He gained the rank of Lieutenant between 1945 and 1947 in the The Black Watch.1 He fought in the Palestine Campaign.2

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 2667. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

[S37] BP2003. [S37]

Diana Katherine Potter1

F, #511893

Last Edited=31 Oct 2014

Diana Katherine Potter is the daughter of Joseph John Edward Potter.2 She married Michael Cotterell Geoffrey David Mordaunt-Smith, son of Cotterell Boughton Mordaunt-Smith and Hon. Kathleen Marcia Browne, on 23 May 1959.2 She and Michael Cotterell Geoffrey David Mordaunt-Smith were divorced in 1971.1

From 23 May 1959, her married name became Mordaunt-Smith.

Damian Kirwan Seton Towers Mordaunt-Smith was born in 1968.1 He is the son of Michael Cotterell Geoffrey David Mordaunt-Smith and Diana Katherine Potter.2

Olwen Marcia Blanche Mordaunt-Smith1

F, #511896, b. 1928

Last Edited=16 Aug 2018

Consanguinity Index=0.0%

Olwen Marcia Blanche Mordaunt-Smith was born in 1928.2 She is the daughter of Cotterell Boughton Mordaunt-Smith and Hon. Kathleen Marcia Browne.2 She married, firstly, Wayne Ewing Harriss on 12 June 1952.1 She married, secondly, Hugh Dearman Janson, son of Charles Wilfred Janson and Nora Cook, on 25 October 1960.2

From 12 June 1952, her married name became Harriss.1 From 25 October 1960, her married name became Janson.2 She lived in 2003 at Barn House, Aldbourne, Marlborough, Wiltshire, England .1

Hon. Christine Louise Beatrix Browne was born on 7 March 1909.1 She was the daughter of Geoffrey Henry Browne, 1st Baron Mereworth and Lady Olwen Verena Ponsonby.2 She died on 15 February 1910.1

Harriet Maude McCarthy1

F, #511899, d. 25 April 1954

Last Edited=14 Oct 2011

Harriet Maude McCarthy married Steuart Murray Binny, son of William Henry Binny and Catherine Sophia Murray, on 12 September 1899.1 She died on 25 April 1954 at Kivernells, Milford-on-Sea, Hampshire, England .1

From 12 September 1899, her married name became Binny.1
